extensionDescription.message: It's a browser extension that helps you easily take notes while web surfing.

modal_modal_question_delete.message: Are you sure you want to reset the data?

error_get_page_content.message: Summarization is not possible on the following sites: New Tab, Chrome Web Store, Chrome Settings page. Please move to another page and press the retry button on the right. If you have newly installed the app, please refresh the page once

error_get_summary.message: Summarization failed. Please try again. If the same error occurs, please contact us using the contact information in the 'Guide' for prompt assistance.
